long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GEMZ.top an IMDb Ratings & Auto-Skip Intros on Netflix extension

Enhance your Netflix experience with GEMZ, a must-have Chrome extension that brings two powerful features to your streaming routine.

Key Features:

IMDb Ratings Integration:

View IMDb ratings directly on the Netflix website.
Make informed decisions about what to watch based on popular ratings.

Auto-Skip Intros:

Streamline your TV show binge-watching experience.
Automatically skip intros, saving you time and delivering an uninterrupted viewing experience.

How to Use:

IMDb Ratings:

Install GEMZ from the Chrome Web Store.
Visit the Netflix website and discover IMDb ratings seamlessly integrated with each title.

Auto-Skip Intros:

Enjoy automatic intro skipping when watching TV shows on Netflix.
